attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Criminal Proceedings should be taken on policians who are defrauding the government and public regarding expense claims.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
